languages.text: "Хозяин велел передать, что желает тебе поскорее отправить Кикеросс к Той, Что Жаждет. Не жди честного боя — ты идешь на казнь. Но Кикеросс не умеет адекватно оценивать то, что не понимает, так что у тебя есть шанс... небольшой".

"The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."
languages.original_text: "Хозяин велел передать, что желает тебе поскорее отправить Кикеросс к Той, Что Жаждет. Не жди честного боя — ты идешь на казнь. Но Кикеросс не умеет адекватно оценивать то, что не понимает, так что у тебя есть шанс... небольшой".

traits.locale_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing that which she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Le maître souhaite que vous aidiez Keykeross à rejoindre l'Assoiffée au plus vite. N'espérez pas un combat loyal. Il s'agit d'une exécution pure et simple. Toutefois, Keykeross a toujours des difficultés à évaluer correctement ce qu'elle ne comprend pas. Vous avez donc une infime chance de vous en sortir. »
languages.original_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."

traits.locale_text: « Le maître souhaite que vous aidiez Keykeross à rejoindre l'Assoiffée au plus vite. N'espérez pas un combat loyal. Il s'agit d'une exécution pure et simple. Toutefois, Keykeross a toujours des difficultés à évaluer correctement ce qu'elle ne comprend pas. Vous avez donc une infime chance de vous en sortir. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “主人希望你送绮克萝丝去见饥渴女士。别以为这会是场公平的战斗，因为绮克萝丝打算在这场战斗中处决你。不过，她无法充分评估她无法理解的东西，因此你还有机会……尽管机会相当渺茫。”
languages.original_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."

traits.locale_text: “主人希望你送绮克萝丝去见饥渴女士。别以为这会是场公平的战斗，因为绮克萝丝打算在这场战斗中处决你。不过，她无法充分评估她无法理解的东西，因此你还有机会……尽管机会相当渺茫。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「我が主は、お前がキーケロスを〈かの渇きたる女〉のもとへ迅速に送り出すことを望まれている。公平な戦いは期待するな。これはお前の処刑なのだ。だがキーケロスは自分が理解できないものを適切に評価することができない。つまりお前にもチャンスがある…ごくわずかではあるがな」
languages.original_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."

traits.locale_text: 「我が主は、お前がキーケロスを〈かの渇きたる女〉のもとへ迅速に送り出すことを望まれている。公平な戦いは期待するな。これはお前の処刑なのだ。だがキーケロスは自分が理解できないものを適切に評価することができない。つまりお前にもチャンスがある…ごくわずかではあるがな」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Der Meister wünscht, dass Ihr Keykeross auf schnelle Reise zu Ihr, die dürstet, schickt. Erwartet aber keinen fairen Kampf. Das wird Eure Hinrichtung. Keykeross ist aber nicht fähig, angemessen einzuordnen, was Sie nicht versteht. Das lässt Euch eine Chance ... auch wenn sie sehr gering ausfällt."
languages.original_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."

traits.locale_text: "Der Meister wünscht, dass Ihr Keykeross auf schnelle Reise zu Ihr, die dürstet, schickt. Erwartet aber keinen fairen Kampf. Das wird Eure Hinrichtung. Keykeross ist aber nicht fähig, angemessen einzuordnen, was Sie nicht versteht. Das lässt Euch eine Chance ... auch wenn sie sehr gering ausfällt."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «El amo desea que mande a Keykeross a reunirse con la Sedienta. No espere un combate limpio; se dirige usted a su ejecución. No obstante, Keykeross es incapaz de valorar adecuadamente lo que no comprende, y eso le brinda una oportunidad... por insignificante que sea».
languages.original_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."

traits.locale_text: «El amo desea que mande a Keykeross a reunirse con la Sedienta. No espere un combate limpio; se dirige usted a su ejecución. No obstante, Keykeross es incapaz de valorar adecuadamente lo que no comprende, y eso le brinda una oportunidad... por insignificante que sea».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Efendimiz, Keykeross'u Susayan'a göndermenizi istiyor. Yolculuğunu hızlı kılın. Adil bir mücadele bekliyorsanız çok beklersiniz. Bu, sizin infazınız. Ancak Keykeross, kavramayı başaramadığı şeyleri tartmaktan yoksundur. Bu yüzden bir şansınız olabilir... Milyonda birlik bir şans..."
languages.original_text: "The master wishes for you to send Keykeross on a swift journey to She Who Thirsts. Do not expect a fair fight. This is your execution. However, Keykeross is incapable of adequately assessing whatever she fails to comprehend, and therefore you stand a chance... albeit a negligible one."

Ancak Keykeross, kavramayı başaramadığı şeyleri tartmaktan yoksundur. Bu yüzden bir şansınız olabilir... Milyonda birlik bir şans..."
